law.catch_line: A jury plan may provide that, notwithstanding the limit on frequency of trial jury service in § 8-3...
law.text: A jury plan may provide that, notwithstanding the limit on frequency of trial jury service in § 8-310(c)(2) of this title, an individual who serves on a jury for fewer than 5 days in a 3-year period may be summoned for jury service after 1 year.
